Temenos Transact | Generated by AI

Home 2025.10

Temenos Transact (formerly known as T24 Transact) is a core banking system provided by Temenos, designed to support retail, corporate, Islamic, and private banking operations. It is a modern, cloud-native, and API-driven banking solution that helps financial institutions automate processes, enhance customer experience, and drive innovation.

Key Features & Functionalities of Temenos Transact

1. Customer & Account Management

  • Onboarding and managing customer profiles
  • KYC and compliance checks
  • Multi-currency account management
  • Deposit and savings account services

2. Payments & Transactions

  • Real-time payments (SWIFT, SEPA, RTGS, ACH, UPI, etc.)
  • Cross-border payments
  • Digital wallets and P2P transfers
  • Payment orchestration and processing

3. Lending & Credit Services

  • Loan origination, approval, and management
  • Mortgage and personal loan processing
  • Credit risk assessment and scoring
  • BNPL (Buy Now, Pay Later) and microfinance options

4. Treasury & Risk Management

  • Liquidity and cash flow management
  • Foreign exchange (FX) and derivatives trading
  • ALM (Asset Liability Management)
  • Market and credit risk analytics

5. Wealth & Investment Management

  • Portfolio and asset management
  • Robo-advisory and investment planning
  • Custody and securities trading

6. Open Banking & API Integrations

  • RESTful and SOAP APIs for seamless integration
  • Third-party fintech and regtech support
  • Open banking compliance (PSD2, Open Banking UK)

7. Compliance & Regulatory Support

  • Anti-Money Laundering (AML) and fraud detection
  • Basel III and IFRS compliance
  • Real-time regulatory reporting

8. Cloud & SaaS Capabilities

  • Cloud-native and multi-cloud support (AWS, Azure, Google Cloud)
  • AI-driven automation for banking operations
  • DevOps and CI/CD integration for faster deployment

Deployment Models

  • On-Premises – Installed within a bank’s infrastructure
  • Cloud (SaaS/PaaS) – Hosted on Temenos Banking Cloud
  • Hybrid – Combination of on-premises and cloud
